short_summary: Implement a new financial tool to improve departmental reporting capabilities and financial forecasting.
description: {"title": "Health Canada is looking to implement a new financial tool to improve departmental reporting capabilities and Financial Forecasting.",  "description": "This new application will replace the existing financial forecasting tool from WebFocus with a more efficient and effective system in support of departmental priorities. These activities will be coordinated with the Public Health Agency of Canada. To that end, timely and accurate financial forecasting and reporting are critical for decision-making. For this reason, a Project Manager Level 3 Consultant is required to work on the Management Reporting Solution (MRS)\Management Variance Reporting (MVR) Replacement Solution as required at Health Canada."
duration_in_months: Do not enter this in response for any level of upgrade.
